SELECT tt.* , tdt.ko_name as tripDestinationKoName, tdt.img FROM trip_tb tt left outer join trip_destination_tb tdt on(tdt.trip_destination_id = tt.trip_destination_id) where tt.user_id = #{userId} and (tt.start_date >= now() or (now() >= tt.start_date and tt.end_date >= now())) order by CASE WHEN NOW() >= tt.start_date AND tt.end_date >= NOW() THEN 0 WHEN tt.start_date >= NOW() THEN 1 ELSE 2 END, tt.start_date ASC LIMIT 1

SELECT p.*, a.trip_id FROM photo_tb p JOIN album_tb a ON p.album_id = a.album_id JOIN ( SELECT album_id, MAX(photo_id) AS max_photo_id FROM photo_tb WHERE album_id IN ( SELECT a.album_id FROM ( SELECT album_id FROM album_tb WHERE trip_id = ( SELECT tt.trip_id FROM tripsketch.trip_tb tt WHERE tt.user_id = 5 AND NOW() >= tt.start_date ORDER BY tt.start_date DESC LIMIT 1 ) ORDER BY album_id DESC LIMIT 3 ) a ) GROUP BY album_id ) pm ON p.album_id = pm.album_id AND p.photo_id = pm.max_photo_id;
